summary: The diff implements a 5-route TanStack Router SPA with shared header/footer and pages for Home, About, Services, Gallery (with modal lightbox), and Contact. A warm neutral + gold theme is introduced via Tailwind/CSS variables. However, required generated static image assets are not evidenced as being added, and service/category visuals are implemented with lucide-react icons rather than the requested generated icon strip.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create and integrate required static images as generated assets under frontend/public/assets/generated, and use them consistently (hero image, gallery placeholders, and simple service category visuals).
missing_requirements.reason: Pages reference files under /assets/generated, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, and the service category visuals are implemented using lucide-react icons rather than the requested generated icon strip/sprite.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx (uses lucide-react icons; no generated icon strip usage shown)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (no mention of adding frontend/public/assets/generated files)

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes 'Built with caffeine.ai' attribution and UTM-tracked external link.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for any site-builder attribution or outbound marketing/tracking links.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced Internet Identity authentication context and actor/query hooks even though authentication is not required for this marketing website.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says Internet Identity is not required for this website; adding auth plumbing is extra functionality beyond requested marketing pages.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty Motoko backend canister actor.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is entirely frontend marketing-site focused and does not request backend changes or a new backend canister entry point.
